          <title>
            <string language="en">Cancer from microwaves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Krebs von den Mikrowellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cancer des micro-ondes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cancer das microondas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cancer dalle microonde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καρκίνος από τα μικροκύματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cáncer de microondas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows an experimental set-up to show that microwaves can cause cancer.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt eine experimentelle

können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre que une installation 
expérimentale prouvait que les micro-ondes peuvent causer le cancer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra uma instalação experimental
para mostrar que as microondas podem causar o cancer.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra una messa a punto 
sperimentale per indicare che le microonde possono causare il cancro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει πειραματική οργάνωση για 
να δείξει ότι τα μικροκύματα μπορούν να προκαλέσουν τον καρκίνο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra una disposición
